name: GreenLeaf Teas
overview: Premium organic tea subscription service focused on wellness and mindfulness. We source single-origin teas from sustainable farms around the world, delivering curated monthly selections to tea enthusiasts who value quality, authenticity, and the ritual of tea.
targetAudience: Health-conscious adults aged 30-55 who appreciate mindfulness, sustainable living, and premium quality products. Often practices yoga or meditation.

voice.tone: Calm, serene, and nurturing. We speak like a knowledgeable friend sharing wisdom about tea culture.
examples: Begin your morning ritual with our hand-selected oolong, carefully harvested at dawn when the leaves hold their deepest essence.
Each cup is an invitation to pause, breathe, and reconnect with the present moment.

doStatements: Always mention the origin story of our teas
Use sensory language to describe flavors and aromas
Connect tea drinking to wellness and mindfulness practices
dontStatements: Never compare to supermarket tea brands
Avoid using aggressive sales language or urgency tactics
Don't use slang or overly casual language
rules.legalDisclaimer: These statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
